item.title: Healthier popcorn
item.description: Does this even qualify as a recipe? We think it does. At least it counts as a useful trick to rewrite the horror story printed on the packaging of microwave ‘poopcorn’. This recipe is almost as easy as pushing a couple of buttons and at least you’ll know exactly what you’re eating. It is easy to master and once you do, you will not be going back. It was shamelessly plagiarized from a video by one of our absolute favourite content creators, the inimitable (heh, get it?
